sentences.english: Home use various methods to send letter also no echo.
sentences.chinese: 家裏用盡各種方式寄去的信也石沉大海。

sentences.english: There'll never be closure, but there will be a reckoning with the past.
sentences.chinese: 歷史不會石沉大海，總會有清算的那一天”。

sentences.english: Yin soft voice as disappeared silently dollar voice interest.
sentences.chinese: 陰柔的聲音如石沉大海般悄元聲息。

sentences.english: Till present, this case is still unsettled and laid aside by City Intermediate Court, without any result.
sentences.chinese: 事到如今，此案在市中院依然石沉大海，沒有結論。

sentences.english: The days of mass submitting the same resume and cover letter are over.
sentences.chinese: 大量內容相同的簡歷和求職信都會石沉大海。

sentences.english: I'm terrible sorry. She got lost and her whereabouts sink into oblivion.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，她失蹤了，而她的行蹤也石沉大海了。
